titleStmt.title: Some considerations about the case of scandal, or, Giving offence to weak brethren
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Benjamin, 1642-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills Jun. for T. Basset ..., B. Tooke ..., and F. Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Benjamin Calamy. Cf. DNB.
A copy at reel 528:1 is eleventh item in v. 1 of A collection of cases and other discourses / by some divines of the city of London.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
